title: FS: Large Group of Low Grade T206 w/ Many HOF's and SL's -PRICE DROP-
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Large Group of Low Grade T206 w/ Many HOF's and SL's -PRICE DROP-
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale. Most of these are obviously low grade. Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans but please feel free to ask any questions. Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. 3 or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):
